bug.author: lunardog
bug.summary: Image Similarity Documentation is still unclear
bug.description:
https://github.com/apple//turicreate/blob/master/src/python/turicreate/toolkits/image_similarity/image_similarity.py#L44
This sentence sounds like it's a patchwork of partial sentences: <denchmark-code> feature : string indicates that the SFrame has only column of Image type and that will Name of the column containing the input images. 'None' (the default) be used for similarity. </denchmark-code>
How should it read?

comments.comment: My attempt to fix in PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/pull/2510>#2510</denchmark-link>
